title: Installation issue: namd
body:
### Spack version
```console
$ spack --version
0.14.1-495-0891c5d
```

### Steps to reproduce the issue
```console
$ spack install namd %intel ^charmpp backend=verbs +cuda
/mnt/resource/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-x86_64/intel-19.0.5.281/intel-19.0.5-tsgparku7c5mgjs2hut5viz5ugslc3l6/bin/icpc -std=c++11 -I/mnt/resource/spack
/opt/spack/linux-centos7-skylake/intel-19.0.5.281/charmpp-6.10.1-jddfbeikrffhau2k3433mjkvlnja6lkp//include -DCMK_OPTIMIZE=1 -Isrc -Iinc    -Iplugins/includ
e -Icolvars/src -DSTATIC_PLUGIN   -I/mnt/resource/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-skylake/intel-19.0.5.281/fftw-3.3.8-5kqzqeahbhcpu2mnisvttyawh2bbwxpw/includ
e -DNAMD_FFTW -DNAMD_FFTW_3     -DNAMD_VERSION=\"2.13\" -DNAMD_PLATFORM=\"linux-x86_64\"  -DREMOVE_PROXYRESULTMSG_EXTRACOPY -DNODEAWARE_PROXY_SPANNINGTREE
-DUSE_NODEPATCHMGR -DBONDED_CUDA -DUSE_HOMETUPLES    -DUSE_CKLOOP=1 -O2 -ip -o obj/ComputeTclBC.o -c src/ComputeTclBC.C
In file included from src/OptPme.C(50):
src/fftlib.h(5): catastrophic error: cannot open source file "cmidirectmanytomany.h"
  #include <cmidirectmanytomany.h>
                                  ^

compilation aborted for src/OptPme.C (code 4)
make: *** [obj/OptPme.o] Error 4
make: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs....
```

### Platform and user environment

```commandline
$ uname -a 
Linux vm 3.10.0-1062.12.1.el7.x86_64 #1 SMP Tue Feb 4 23:02:59 UTC 2020 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux
$ lsb_release -d
CentOS Linux release 7.7.1908 (Core)
``` 

### Additional information

```console
spack spec --install-status namd %intel ^charmpp backend=verbs +cuda
Input spec
--------------------------------
 -   namd%intel
 -       ^charmpp backend=verbs +cuda

Concretized
--------------------------------
 -   namd@2.13%intel@19.0.5.281 fftw=3 interface=none arch=linux-centos7-skylake
[+]      ^charmpp@6.10.1%intel@19.0.5.281 backend=verbs build-target=LIBS +cuda~omp~papi+production~pthreads+shared+smp~syncft~tcp~tracing arch=linux-cento
s7-skylake
[+]          ^cuda@10.2.89%intel@19.0.5.281 arch=linux-centos7-skylake
[+]              ^libxml2@2.9.9%intel@19.0.5.281~python arch=linux-centos7-skylake
[+]                  ^libiconv@1.16%intel@19.0.5.281 arch=linux-centos7-skylake
[+]                  ^pkgconf@1.6.3%intel@19.0.5.281 arch=linux-centos7-skylake
[+]                  ^xz@5.2.5%intel@19.0.5.281 arch=linux-centos7-skylake
[+]                  ^zlib@1.2.11%intel@19.0.5.281+optimize+pic+shared arch=linux-centos7-skylake
[+]      ^fftw@3.3.8%intel@19.0.5.281+mpi~openmp~pfft_patches precision=double,float arch=linux-centos7-skylake
```
